CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, June 24, 1961, pg. A7, reads: "St. Brigid's Graduates - Graduation exercises were held in Holy Trinity Church, recently, for 30 pupils in St. Brigid's Kindergarten. First row, left to right: Denice Turner, undergraduate; Bernadete Stanley, Cecilia Goines, Anita Holley, June Collins, Debra Green, Cornell Lee, Rock Lee Leonard, Christopher Thompson and Jewel McCallister, undergraduate.  Second row: Walter Barton, Alda White, Juanita Thompson, Carlotte Greene, La San Owens, Irene Pinnick, Emmet Pratt, Vernon Brown, James Durham, and Daryl Mitchell, undergraduate.  Third row: Darnell Mitchell, Judith Sims, Louis Mc Callister, Justine Collins, Charmaine Johnson, Freddie Molder, Leonard Howard, Pierre Blackwell, Quince Reynolds and Shawna Robinson.  Fourth row: Father Paul Bassompierre, Alberta Page, Sister Rose Elizabeth and Father John La Bauve. Missing from the picture are James Sims, Denise Jones, Victor O'Neill and Sandra Williams. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Group portrait of St. Brigid kindergarten graduates, first row from left: Denice [Denise?] Turner, Bernadete [Bernadette?] Stanley, Cecilia Goines [Gaines?], Anita Holley, June Collins, Debra Green, Cornell Lee, Rock Lee Leonard, Christopher Thompson, and Jewel McCallister; second row: Walter Barton, Alda White, Juanita Thompson, Carlotte Greene, La San Owens, Irene Pinnick, Emmet [Emmett] Pratt, Vernon Brown, James Durham, and Daryl Mitchell, third row: Darnell Mitchell, Judith Sims, Louis Mc Callister, Justine Collins, Charmaine Johnson, Freddie Molder, Leonard Howard, Pierre Blackwell, Quince Reynolds, and Shawna Robinson; fourth row: Father Paul Bassompierre, Alberta Page, Sister Rose Elizabeth, and Father John La Bauve, posed on steps of Holy Trinity Church
